title: Theme Context Provider
instructions:
Create a theme context that provides dark/light mode to the app.

Requirements:
1. Create a ThemeContext using createContext
2. Create a ThemeProvider component that manages theme state
3. Provide a toggleTheme function through context
4. Create a useTheme hook for easy access
5. Style components based on the current theme

Context provides a way to pass data through the component tree without prop drilling.
